author: Odeinoichus
title: Not a fan, but good method of getting Flama.
review:
Set #70339 Ultimate Flama: The second set of Ultimate NEXO Knights included more of the Lava Monsters and in most cases even less pieces for the NEXO Powers gimmicks, case in point here’s one of the weaker offerings as far as piece counts go.

Packaging

I’ve mentioned this pretty much in all my other reviews to date, these Ultimate NEXO Knights characters have much better packaging compared to the first batch of Speedorz, I believe this style of packaging was introduced in the final Speedorz releases during the Fire & Ice era. It does what it sets out to do, nothing much more to say than that.

Minifigure

Flama: This variant of Flama is in his Ultimate Form, apparently this makes him quite flammable as he’s burst into orange detailing on his print. This indicates he’s grown more powerful, even his tail piece is cast in this orange coloured ABS plastic compared to his regular form.

His head is a double-sided print with only one facial expression, the back of his head has detailing of spots that represent sunspots or heat spots showing he’s dangerously aflame. The head piece is a unique one that is quite nice, I think it was introduced during Ultra Agents, though since is my first time with the part I can’t be certain as to that detail. Overall he’s a great looking figure.

The Nexo Powers & Display Stand

Flame Wreck: With a glowing flame sword and a hammer falling in flames printed on the NEXO Shield Flame Wreck grants Flama the power to smash enemies with a giant hammer, the build of which is quite fun and slightly reminiscent of some of the builds we’ve seen with Harley Quinn.

Slime Blast: Keeping the large hammer, according to the instructions, Flama swaps out his NEXO Power with a green piece printed with a disgusting ball of slime on the front. He changes his flame sword for a stud shooter with matching green transparent studs for slime effects.

Ice Dragon: Again, according to the instructions you keep the hammer attached to Flama’s back, his shield is given a new white piece with printed dragon head and neck elements and a three pronged throwing weapon using a part first introduced during Ninjago… I believe this might be the Technic Blade piece from the Ghost Season, but I honestly have no idea.

The display stand build is identical to what has been seen in every other Ultimate NEXO Knight and there isn’t much more to be said about it.

Overall opinion

This is a very weak offering, much like some of the other Lava Monster characters I find that this particular set is only good for the Minifigure and the NEXO Powers printed elements. Due to the build used for the back-mounted smashing hammer it might have been nice to see some extra parts used to swap out the head of the weapon with each different power, one for the flames, a different head or even some kind of extra slime-shooter for the slime power and then some kind of icicle spear or something for the dragon power.

As is it’s a unfortunately very weak and I only mildly recommend it for completionists or fans of the Minifigures/NEXO Power elements.
